prompts.kleinanzeigen:
i want to create an announce on ebay kleinanzeigen. It should be in german. 
item: samsung a8
prompts.vegan recipe: easy vegan meal using tofu, soy milk and verduras. When you finished your reponse. write 'Ich habe fertig' as very last sentence.
prompts.programming: i use vscode and nvim. I have these files that i marked with TODO. I want you to process the TODOs.
prompts.self: im working on this project to automate my chatgpt usage. I want you to do the TODOs i write in my code. Or at least assist me with it.
